title: A sunrise like no other
caption: A sunrise like no other
desc: What a beautiful view to welcome in the new year! Today’s serene scene is Mount Fuji, long a destination for pilgrims, poets and artists. Often pictured capped in snow, the volcano is also Japan's highest peak at 3,776m (12,388ft) and is a registered Unesco World Heritage site.
copyright: Sunrise at Mount Fuji, Japan (© Juan Paulo Gutierrez/Getty Images)
